QuestData.Title: To Raene Wolfrunner
QuestData.Description: I would ask you to deliver the gem directly to Raene Wolfrunner. Last I heard, she was still in Astranaar to the southeast.$B$BAt least the road between here and there is still relatively safe, so it should be a simple matter of following it there. Of course, if you'd rather, I believe that Sentinel Avana would be willing to loan you one of her nightsabers to swiftly make the trip.$B$BWhatever you choose, good health to you, $n. May our paths cross again soon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Glowing Gem to Raene Wolfrunner at Astranaar in Ashenvale.
QuestData.CompletionText: I am Raene Wolfrunner. Who might you be?
QuestData.RewardText: Teronis is dead?$B$B<The lady weeps softly for the loss of her friend and then composes herself after a moment.>$B$BWe must see to it that his sacrifice was not in vain. Are you willing to see this through, $c?$B$BVery well, allow me some time to think about how we should proceed. I will know shortly.
